descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
Reinforced Armor (only for males)

I tried to create a realisticly looking armor for higher levels, so it requires dragon perk for crafting and has a litle bit higher stats than dragonplate armor.

The body armor is an iron armor with single pauldron and chainmail.
Boots are retextured heavy imperial boots. 
Bracers are retextured studded (leather) bracers.

-standalone
-Armor type: heavy
-little bit stronger than Dragon Armor
-craftable at any forge under \"Dragon\"

Install
=======
Extract the archive. Paste everything into your skyrim/data folder.

Uninstall
=========
Delete Folder
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Rhage87&D13
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Rhage87&D13

Delete ESP file 
Skyrim\\Data\\ReinforcedIron.esp

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
Darkangel13 for making it standalone
Jack Collins for the inspiration 

HAVE FUN
author: Rhage87
